bridge_opening_ref.description: RIS_ID of the same object in the RIS Index of the other country, which shares the common border and is responsible for providing the geometric data. The reference is necessary, because some attributes (e.g. OBJ_NAME) might deviate from each other.

cl_height_cm.description: Available height in cm based on the reference height (HEIGHT_REF) of the bridge.

cl_height_open_cm.description: Available height in cm of the operable bridge in opened condition, based on the reference height (HEIGHT_REF) of the bridge. Don't fill this parameter in case of a fixed bridge.

abs_height_cm.description: Absolute height of the bridge based upon the used reference level for heights.

abs_height_open_cm.description: Absolute height of the open bridge (if applicable) based upon the used reference level for heights.
